original_title: Searching for Beauty in Student Loan Debt or at Least the Envelopes in Which it Comes
overview: In "Searching for Beauty in Student Loan Debt or at Least the Envelopes in Which it Comes", Nicky Tavares reminds us of the process of making within a society based on profit and capitalised interest. Screen printing the insides of debt-letter envelopes onto 16mm film, Tavares invites us to ‘dream in colour of solvency that may never come.’
title: Searching for Beauty in Student Loan Debt or at Least the Envelopes in Which it Comes
